description: This is an HTML file for a web-based database viewer interface, including embedded CSS styling and JavaScript for dynamic functionality such as loading database lists, tables, and data, and handling user interactions.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases from the server.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resetting the view and initiating a new load.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show or hide its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table within a database.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders data into an HTML table structure within the content container.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates table cell HTML based on the value, handling objects, long strings, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for lengthy or object data.
